description:
Hike, stride and trek happy through winter with these versatile snowshoes. Micro-adjustable boa closure bindings provide a locked-in, comfortable and nuanced fit for trekking. The moderately aggressive crampons hit the sweet spot between traction and mobility for when tackling powder or hard-packed ice.

  • 6061 T6 aluminum frame is lightweight and durable
  • Contour frame design encourages a natural stride, optimized surface area and excellent show shedding performance for a lightweight feel
  • Contact binding harness with 360 degrees of retention provides excellent support in changing conditions
  • Boa closure system is micro-adjustable for a locked in, comfortable and nuanced fit without pressure points
  • Lightec decking is durable, light and flexible in even the coldest conditions (rated to -40C)
  • Traxx+ carbon steel crampons provide excellent multi-directional traction over all types of terrain
  • Fixed pivot design yields excellent foot rotation and heel stability
name: Louis Garneau Massif Snowshoes - Unisex
